content.rendered: We're so excited to bring you our brand-new Outpost in Idaho Springs for Clear Creek rafting trips! It is currently undergoing major construction and will be opening Memorial Day 2010. We're planning a big and exciting GRAND OPENING party at the beginning of June–stay tuned for details. Book one of our Clear Creek rafting trips this summer! Here is the “before” picture. Just wait 'till you see the “after” one!
